## Pre-Merge Checklist

- [ ] Linked issue/ticket URL provided above
- [ ] Risk assessment completed
- [ ] Rollback plan documented
- [ ] Tests pass (CI green)
- [ ] No PII in logs or artifacts
- [ ] Documentation updated (if needed)
